main.name: Alex Wang
main.description: I'm a student at the University of Pittsburgh planning to major in Computer Science and minor in Economics and Philosophy
main.bio: I am looking for a Software Engineering internship or research position for Summer 2021 that will allow me to continue to further my technical and soft skills and gain some valuable work experience. When I am not coding or doing coursework, I spend my time either lifting, hiking, or cooking.
main.contactmessage: Send me a message, I'll get back to you within 24 hours

resume.skillmessage: I am always looking for opportunities to build upon my prior skills and pick up new ones

education.description: Current first year student at the school of Computing and Information. Some topics I'm interested in include blockchain, computer ethics, game theory, and HCI.

work.title: Pro Player
work.description: I competed on the professional level and won multiple online cash tournaments which improved my team building skills and sharpened my competitive spirit.

projects.title: Chess
projects.category: This was my first project I completed shortly after my first semester. I used Maven and Java OOP design patterns to create a fully functional Chess emulator on the command line.

projects.title: Phonebook
projects.category: A simple website I made using React, Express, and MongoDB. It allows users to provide their credentials and will store only the validated phone numbers. It also has filtering for parsing through a larger set of people

projects.title: Twitter Bot
projects.category: This was mostly a for leisure project where I made a bot that could automatically reply to tweets matching queries and also store those tweets into a text file
